ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISBLANK(Opening_Hours__c)) && ( NOT(REGEX(Opening_Hours__c, "^(?:0?[0-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-(?:0?[0-9]|1[0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$")) || ( VALUE(LEFT(Opening_Hours__c,2))*60 + VALUE(MID(Opening_Hours__c,4,2)) >= VALUE(MID(Opening_Hours__c,7,2))*60 + VALUE(RIGHT(Opening_Hours__c,2)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter opening hours in the format hh:mm-hh:mm, where the start time must be earlier than the end time.
